2912:44: none“> śrīmatānaṅga vajjreṇa saṃkṣepāt tattvato mayā |
2912:56: none“> bhavaḥ sa eva cākhyāto bālavyāmohako budhaiḥ||3||
2912:80: none“> prajñāhīnatayā tāvat sva [ hitaṃ ] parahitaṃ na ca ||6||
2912:88: none“> irtukāmaiśca santyājyo [ bhāva ] grāho manīṣibhiḥ ||7||
2912:92: none“> bhāvaṃgrāhaṃ parityajya nābhāvaṃ kalpayed budhaḥ |
2912:96: none“> yadi nāmānayorbhedaḥ kalpanā naiva bhidyate ||8||
2912:100: none“> varaṃ hi bhāvasaṅkalpo na tvabhāvaprakalpanā |
2912:104: none“> nirvāti jvalito dīpo nirvṛtaḥ kāṃ gatiṃ vrajet ||9||
2912:108: none“> yāvad bhāvasya saṅkalpastāvad bhāvo hi lakṣyate |
2912:124: none“> evaṃ bhāvaḥ parityājyo bhrāntatvādindra jālavat |
2912:152: none“> sarvasattvān yatastasmāt kṛpā rāgaḥ pragīyate ||15||
2912:172: none“> prakṣeptuṃ cāpanetuṃ ca śakyate yatra naiva hi |
2912:176: none“> prakṣepāya ca yaduktaṃ dharmatattvaṃ taducyate ||18||
2912:188: none“> na dvayaṃ nādvayaṃ śāntaṃ śivaṃ sarvatra saṃsthitam |
2912:212: none“> kāyatrayaṃ triyānaṃ ca asaṅkhyā mantrakoṭayaḥ |
2912:224: none“> pretādayastathā cāndhe nirudhyante ca tatra hi ||24||
2912:236: none“> idameva samāgamya mambudvāḥ sugatāḥ purā |
2912:240: none“> sambuddhyante ca sarvatra sambhotsyante jagadvitāḥ ||26||
2912:286: none“> athātaḥ kathyate kiñcit tattvaratnasya labdhaye |
2912:302: none“> idaṃ taditi tadvaktuṃ naiva śakyaṃ jinairapi |
2912:306: none“> pratyātmavedyarūpatvād bāhyārthe na ca gṛhyate ||3||
2912:318: none“> śrutādijñānagamyaṃ tanna bhaved vai kadācana |
2912:326: none“> ata eva sadā''saktyā yuktaṃ sadgurusevanam |
2912:330: none“> na ca tena vinā tattvaṃ prāpyate kalpakoṭibhiḥ ||6||
2912:334: none“> aprāpte tattvaratne tu siddhirnaiva kadācana |
2912:342: none“> sāmnā yāḥ santi ye kecit prajñopāyārthadeśakāḥ |
2912:406: none“> uktāḥ śrīvajranāthena samaye tu mahādbhute |
2912:414: none“> upāsyeka guruṃ pūrvaṃ nānugṛhṇāti māmiti |
2912:430: none“> kathañcit prāpya tad jñānaṃ manyante na guruṃ purā |
2912:438: none“> anye ca kupitāḥ prāhuḥ gṛhṇa tvaṃ yat samarpitam |
2912:442: none“> ahaṃ na tava śiṣā'smi na bhavān sāmprataṃ guruḥ ||20||
2912:446: none“> kutasteṣāṃ bhavet siddhiḥ saukhyaṃ caiveha janmani |
2912:450: none“> guruvañcanacittā ye te bhramanti viḍambitāḥ ||21||
2912:458: none“> uktāḥ śrīvajranāthena sarve te'pāya bhājanāḥ ||22||
2912:498: none“> triṣkālaṃ parayā bhaktyā śirasā pādavandanaiḥ ||27||
2912:510: none“> nityaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ śuddhaṃ bodhicittaṃ jinālayam |
2912:550: none“> mānaṃ [ spardvāṃ ] kapaṭapaṭalaṃ sarvamutsṛjya dhīraiḥ
2912:554: none“> yaiḥ sāmnāyo gururamamayā śraddhayā sevyate'tra |
2912:558: none“> agrāḥ prāptāḥ sakalasugatāḥ yat samāsādya bodhiṃ
2912:562: none“> nūnaṃ tattai rjinaguṇapadaṃ prāpyate tattvaratnam ||34||
2912:608: none“> mantramārge tathā coktaṃ sambuddhaiḥ paramārthataḥ |
2912:636: none“> bhaktyā sampūjya yatnena mudrayā saha nāyakam ||7||
2912:640: none“> śiṣyo bhūmau samāropya śradvayā jānumaṇḍalam |
2912:652: none“> sarvajña jñānasandoha jñānamūrtte namo'stu te ||9||
2912:668: none“> sambhavanti sadā nātha bodhicitta namo'stu te ||11||
2912:676: none“> caidhātukamidaṃ sarvaṃ jagaddīra namo'stu te ||12||
2912:684: none“> sugatājñākara śrīman buddhaputra namo'stu te ||13||
2912:688: none“> jñātaṃ me'nuttaraṃ tattvaṃ prasādāt te guṇārṇava |
2912:692: none“> vajrābhiṣekaṃ sarvajña prasādaṃ kuru sāmpratam ||14||
2912:700: none“> yathā śrīcittavajreṇa tathā nātha prasīda me ||15||
2912:704: none“> bhavatpādāmbuje tyaktvā nānyā me vidyate gatiḥ |
2912:716: none“> samutpādya kṛpāṃ śiṣyaṃ āhuya gaṇamaṇḍale ||17||
2912:736: none“> mudrāyogaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā ācāryaḥ subhagottamaḥ |
2912:740: none“> niveśya padmabhāṇḍe tu bodhicittaṃ jinālaye ||20||
2912:756: none“> dadyād vai samayaṃ ramyaṃ divyaṃ prakṛtinirmalam ||22||
2912:768: none“> idaṃ te samayaṃ vatsa pūrvabuddhairudāhṛtam |
2912:772: none“> pālayasva sadā bhadra saṃvaraṃ śṛṇu sāmpratam ||24||
2912:776: none“> nahi prāṇibadhaḥ kāryaḥ triratnaṃ mā parityaja |
2912:780: none“> ācāryaste na santyājyaḥ saṃvaro duratikramaḥ ||25||
2912:788: none“> anujñāṃ ca tato dadyāt tasmai buddhāgrasūnave ||26||
2912:804: none“> akhinno vigatāsaṅgaḥ sattvārthaṃ kuru sāmpratam ||28||
2912:816: none“> adya me saphalaṃ janma saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me |
2912:820: none“> adya buddhakule jāto buddhaputro'si sāmpratam ||30||
2912:828: none“> tārito'haṃ tvayā nātha kleśapaṅka sudustarāt ||31||
2912:836: none“> bodhaye na ca me kāṅkṣā prahīṇāḥ sarvavāsanāḥ ||32||
2912:844: none“> yad yadiṣṭataraṃ dravyaṃ tat tadeva nivedayet ||33||
2912:852: none“> śiṣyasyāgrahanāśāya grāhyaṃ tasya hitāya ca ||34||
2912:856: none“> tataḥ praṇamya sampūjya dattvā ca gurudakṣiṇām |
2912:868: none“> yathā te'nuttarāṃ bodhiṃ prasādāt sādhayāmyaham ||36||
2912:938: none“> parārthārabdha vīryāṇāṃ sādhakānāṃ hitāya vai ||1||
2912:942: none“> yāṃ vibhāvya na saṃsāre ghore dustaravāridhau |
2912:946: none“> nirvāṇe'pi na tiṣṭhanti yoginaḥ svārthamātrake ||2||
2912:958: none“> pañcaskandhādikān dharmān nātikrāmati yo na ca |
2912:966: none“> na śrūnyabhāvanāṃ kuryāt nāpi cāśrūnyabhāvanām |
2912:970: none“> na śrūnyaṃ santyajed yogī na cāśrūnyaṃ parityajet ||5||
2912:978: none“> parityāge ca saṅkalpastasmādetad dvayaṃ tyajet ||6||
2912:994: none“> ādyanta kalpanāmukto vyomavad bhāvayed budhaḥ ||8||
2912:1001: none“> na cāpi sattvavaimukhyaṃ karttavyaṃ karuṇāvatā |
2912:1005: none“> sattvo nāmāsti nāstīti na caivaṃ parikalpayet |
2912:1021: none“> ekībhūtā dhiyā sārddhaṃ gagane gaganaṃ yathā ||11||
2912:1025: none“> na ya ca bhāvakaḥ kaścit nāpi kācid vibhāvanā |
2912:1029: none“> bhāvanīyaṃ na caivāsti socyate tattvabhāvanā ||12||
2912:1033: none“> na karttā kaścidastyatra bhoktā naivāca vidyate |
2912:1041: none“> na cātra grāhakaḥ kaścit na vā kaścit samarpakaḥ |
2912:1045: none“> na prahāryamataḥ kiñcit grāhyaṃ naivātra vidyate ||14||
2912:1049: none“> paśyatāṃ sarvarūpāṇi śṛṇvatāṃ śabdameva ca |
2912:1053: none“> jalpatāṃ hamatāṃ vāpi prāśnatāṃ vividhān rasām ||15||
2912:1057: none“> kurvatāṃ sarvakarmāṇi anyatra gata cetasām |
2912:1061: none“> ajasraṃ yogināṃ yogo jāyate tattvavedi nām ||16||
2912:1069: none“> vajraṃ śrīvajrasattvaṃ ca sambuddho bodhirea ca ||17||
2912:1093: none“> bhāvā bhāvavinirmukto bhāvayan sidhyate laghu ||20||
2912:1101: none“> anantāstasya jāyante śrīmantaḥ saugatā guṇāḥ ||21||
2912:1129: none“> grāhyaṃ na ca grāhakamagra sattvaṃ
2912:1169: none“> yāvat kalpatamaḥ paṭena guruṇā ruddhaṃ mano janmināṃ
2912:1173: none“> tāvad duḥkhamanantakaṃ virahitaṃ syāt tena yāvat tataḥ |
2912:1181: none“> kāryaṃ tatkṛtaye svayaṃ suvipulāṃ rakṣyanti tatsaṅgatim ||26||
